data.name: Super Ember Kaboom
data.detailed_description:
Super Ember Kaboom is a fast-paced, cute-and-colorful action game. It has tight controls and simple to learn, difficult to master gameplay that makes each level a joy to run through.

Grimoire, the so called "world's greatest magician", has captured the elemental spirits. Without their protection, dangerous monsters have appeared and the world is being thrown into chaos! Run, roll, wall kick, and tail spin your way through Grimoire's armies. Rescue spirits and use their magic to power up!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz 2.71 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
